items.title: Abstract Exists
items.description: Ensure abstract exists in MyST project

items.title: Abstract Length
items.description: Ensure abstract in MyST project is the correct length

items.title: Availability Statement Exists
items.description: Ensure availability statement exists in MyST project

items.title: Citation is unique
items.description: Citation does not have any duplicate identifiers in the MyST project.

items.title: Bib file exists
items.description: Bib file referenced in config file exists in the MyST project.

items.title: MyST citation checks pass
items.description: No citation-related errors or warnings are produced during MyST build.

items.title: Code metadata lifted
items.description: Metadata defined on code is lifted to blocks; often failures are associated with multiple code metadata definitions within one block.

items.title: Code metatags valid
items.description: Tags in code metadata must be a list of strings, and they must not conflict with each other.

items.title: Code lang defined
items.description: Code blocks should define their language

items.title: Code metadata loads
items.description: Code metadata must be valid yaml.

items.title: Inline expression renders
items.description: Inline expression must be a recognized mime bundle.

items.title: MyST code checks pass
items.description: No code-related errors or warnings are produced during MyST build.

items.title: Known Directive
items.description: Check if directive is recognized.

items.title: Directive Argument Validates
items.description: Argument is valid, according to the rules of the specific directive.

items.title: Directive Options Validate
items.description: Options are valid, according to the rules of the specific directive.

items.title: Directive Body Validates
items.description: Body is valid, according to the rules of the specific directive.

items.title: MyST directive checks pass
items.description: No directive-related errors or warnings are produced during MyST build.

items.title: DOCX Renders Successfully
items.description: The document renders to DOCX format without errors.

items.title: JATS Renders Successfully
items.description: The document renders to JATS format without errors.

items.title: Markdown Renders Successfully
items.description: The document renders to Markdown format without errors.

items.title: MECA Includes JATS
items.description: MECA bundle includes a single JATS document.

items.title: MECA Includes Manuscripts
items.description: Manuscript files (pdf, docx, etc) are built and included in MECA bundle.

items.title: MECA Includes Files
items.description: Files are copied successfully to MECA bundle.

items.title: PDF Builds Without Errors
items.description: PDF generation completes without errors.

items.title: PDF Builds Successfully
items.description: The document builds to PDF format without errors.

items.title: TeX Renders Successfully
items.description: The document renders to TeX format without errors.

items.title: Export Extension Correct
items.description: The exported file has the correct file extension.

items.title: Exported Article Exists
items.description: The exported article exists as expected.

items.title: MyST export checks pass
items.description: No export-related errors or warnings are produced during MyST build.

items.title: Valid Config Structure
items.description: The configuration file has a valid structure.

items.title: Site Config Exists
items.description: The site configuration file exists.

items.title: Project Config Exists
items.description: The project configuration file exists.

items.title: Valid Site Config
items.description: The site configuration is valid.

items.title: Valid Project Config
items.description: The project configuration is valid.

items.title: Config Has No Deprecated Fields
items.description: There are no deprecated fields in the configuration file.

items.title: Frontmatter Is YAML
items.description: The frontmatter format is YAML.

items.title: Valid Page Frontmatter
items.description: The page frontmatter is valid.

items.title: Valid Export List
items.description: The frontmatter export list is valid.

items.title: MyST frontmatter checks pass
items.description: No frontmatter-related errors or warnings are produced during MyST build.

items.title: Image Downloads
items.description: Remote images are downloaded successfully.

items.title: Image Exists
items.description: The image exists on disk.

items.title: Image Format Converts
items.description: Image format is converted successfully from unsupported to supported format.

items.title: Image Copied
items.description: Image is copied successfully from source location.

items.title: Image Format Optimizes
items.description: Images format is converted to webp for optimal web performance.

items.title: MyST image checks pass
items.description: No image-related errors or warnings are produced during MyST build.

items.title: Valid MyST Link
items.description: Myst link to local or intersphinx content is valid.

items.title: Valid RRID Link
items.description: The RRID link matches expected pattern.

items.title: Valid Wikipedia Link
items.description: Wikipedia link matches expected pattern.

items.title: Valid DOI Link
items.description: DOI link is a valid DOI.

items.title: Link Resolves
items.description: Link can be successfully fetched.

items.title: MyST link checks pass
items.description: No link-related errors or warnings are produced during MyST build.

items.title: Math Label Lifted
items.description: Enumerated math label is identified and lifted from latex.

items.title: Math Equation Env Removed
items.description: Equation environment is removed from latex.

items.title: Eqnarray Replaced
items.description: Latex align environment should be used instead of eqnarray.

items.title: Math Alignment Adjusted
items.description: Math align environment renders correctly.

items.title: Math Renders Successfully
items.description: Equation renders without any warning or errors.

items.title: MyST math checks pass
items.description: No math-related errors or warnings are produced during MyST build.

items.title: MDAST Snippet Imports
items.description: MDAST snippet imports are resolved and loaded.

items.title: Include Content Filters
items.description: Line number filters apply to include content successfully.

items.title: Include Content Loads
items.description: Include content resolves and loads.

items.title: Gated Nodes Join
items.description: Gated nodes are successfully joined.

items.title: Glossary Uses Definition List
items.description: Glossary contains terms as a definition list.

items.title: Block Metadata Loads
items.description: Block metadata is loaded successfully.

items.title: MyST miscellaneous content checks pass
items.description: No miscellaneous content-related errors or warnings are produced during MyST build.

items.title: Notebook Attachments Resolve
items.description: Notebook attachments successfully load.

items.title: Notebook Output Copied
items.description: Notebook output is copied to separate file.

items.title: MyST notebook checks pass
items.description: No notebook-related errors or warnings are produced during MyST build.

items.title: TeX Parses
items.description: TeX source file parses to MyST

items.title: JATS Parses
items.description: JATS source file parses to MyST

items.title: MyST File Loads
items.description: MyST markdown/notebook file parses to MyST

items.title: MyST parse checks pass
items.description: No parse-related errors or warnings are produced during MyST build.

items.title: Reference Template Fills
items.description: Template for reference enumeration is valid and fills.

items.title: Unique Identifier
items.description: Identifiers are unique.

items.title: Reference Target Resolves
items.description: Cross-reference target exists and resolves.

items.title: Valid Reference Syntax
items.description: Cross-reference syntax is valid.

items.title: Explicit Reference Target
items.description: Cross-reference target is explicitly specified.

items.title: Footnote References Definition
items.description: Footnote references correctly point to their definitions.

items.title: Intersphinx References Resolve
items.description: Intersphinx references successfully resolve.

items.title: MyST reference checks pass
items.description: No reference-related errors or warnings are produced during MyST build.

items.title: Known Role
items.description: Check if role is recognized.

items.title: Role Body Validates
items.description: Body is valid, according to the rules of the specific role.

items.title: MyST role checks pass
items.description: No role-related errors or warnings are produced during MyST build.

items.title: Static File Copied
items.description: Static site asset successfully copied.

items.title: Export File Copied
items.description: Exported file is successfully copied.

items.title: Source File Copied
items.description: Source file for MyST site is successfully copied.

items.title: Template File Copied
items.description: Supporting template file is successfully copied.

items.title: Static Action File Copied
items.description: Static site action file is successfully copied.

items.title: MyST static file checks pass
items.description: No static-file-related errors or warnings are produced during MyST build.

items.title: TOC Contents Exist
items.description: The table of contents points to existing files.

items.title: Valid TOC Structure
items.description: The table of contents has a valid basic structure.

items.title: Valid TOC
items.description: The table of contents is able to load.

items.title: MyST toc checks pass
items.description: No toc-related errors or warnings are produced during MyST build.
